title: Speech Bubble Font
content: Can anyone recommend a font that would work well in speech bubbles? I’m looking for something clean, casual, and modern, with a bit of a hand drawn look. And of course, I’m looking for something completely unlike comic sans.
author: jonathanhughes

comments.content: I would take a look at this site: [http://www.blambot.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20090429040718/http:/www.blambot.com/ "http://www.blambot.com/")
[Comicraft](http://web.archive.org/web/20090429040718/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/foundry/comicraft/) is also a specialist in comic book lettering.
